post:
First come first serve, limited quantities in stock. Once we sell out, the deals will be gone. We're not a budget provider, so those who have used us in the past know that these deals do not come often unless we have a lot of excess inventory to clear out.

All servers include DDoS protection, newly upgraded network, and great support.

Instant Deploy - Delivered instantly upon verified payment, OS installed in about 10 minutes.<br>
Custom Servers - 12 to 48 hour setup time.

Custom - [Intel Core i7 3770](http://www.reliablesite.net/dedicated-servers/quad-core-server/intel-core-i7-3770), 16+ GB RAM @ $49/mo w/Coupon Xeon40

Custom - [Intel Xeon E3 1245 V2](http://www.reliablesite.net/dedicated-servers/quad-core-server/intel-xeon-e3-1245v2), 16+ GB RAM @ $49/mo w/Coupon Xeon40

Custom - [Intel Core i7 4770](http://www.reliablesite.net/dedicated-servers/quad-core-server/intel-core-i7-4770), 8+ GB RAM @ $49/mo w/Coupon Xeon40

Instant - [Intel Xeon E3 1230 V3](http://www.reliablesite.net/dedicated-servers/quad-core-server/intel-xeon-e3-1230v3-8GB), 8 GB RAM, 64 GB SSD @ $49/mo w/Coupon Xeon40

More Deals: http://www.reliablesite.net/dedicated-servers/community-specials.aspx
